en.text:
1.5.8 (186)

New Features & Improvements
- Features can now have Attached Spells.
- Spells can consume Custom Resources or Item Charges when casting.
- Toggleable Modifiers overhauled: "Additional Damage Formula" replaced with "Extra Damages"; "Weapon Hit Bonus" and "Weapon Damage Bonus" now support formulas (e.g., "1d6+2").
- Improved Spell Filters with more parameters.
- Improved compatibility with Archivist Campaign files.
- Bug Fixes: Resolved issues with Class Primary Attributes, Passive Perception, Initiative calculation, Resource Counters, and Spell Slot detection.
- Important: Items/Spells created within a character are local; use the Compendium Tab to save them to the official Database.
- Italian added! Thanks to @Alss on Discord for the complete translation! Grazie!
